channel.title: Sci Fi on ddandrew's home site
channel.description: Recent content in Sci Fi on ddandrew's home site

item.title: The Star
item.description: Arthur C. Clarke It is three thousand light-years to the Vatican. Once, I believed that space could have no power over faith, just as I believed that the heavens declared the glory of God’s handiwork. Now I have seen that handiwork, and my faith is sorely troubled. I stare at the crucifix that hangs on the cabin above the Mark VI Computer, and for the first time in my life I wonder if it is no more than an empty symbol.

item.title: The Last Question
item.description: The Last Question By Isaac Asimov Arthur Isaac Asimov This is by far my favorite story of all those I have written. After all, I undertook to tell several trillion years of human history in the space of a short story and I leave it to you as to how well I succeeded. I also undertook another task, but I won't tell you what that was lest l spoil the story for you.
